There must be more to the error message than that. There will usually be mo=
re details in the heritrix_out.log.

Most likely it is not finding the inde=
x.

You may also want to begin with the example profile that is supplied wi=
th the deduplicator. It should work, as is, if you just set the "deduplicat=
or.indexLocation" and "metadata.operatorContactUrl" to appropriate values a=
nd add some seeds.

- Kris
